## RichText class

`RichText` is an extended data type for the contents of a text editor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class RichText 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(rgaTreeSplit, createdAt)](./yorkie-js-sdk.richtext._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>RichText</code> class |

|  [edit(fromIdx, toIdx, content, attributes)](./yorkie-js-sdk.richtext.edit.md) |  | Don't use edit directly. Be sure to use it through a proxy. The reason for setting the RichText type as the return value is to provide the RichText interface to the user. |
